price: ምእመናኖች ወንድማመቾች ናቸው፡፡ በሁለት ወንድሞቻችሁም መካከል አስታርቁ፡፡ ይታዘንላችሁም ዘንድ አላህን ፍሩ፡፡
arabic: إِنَّمَا ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ إِخۡوَةٞ فَأَصۡلِحُواْ بَيۡنَ أَخَوَيۡكُمۡۚ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَمُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innamā al-mu'minūna ikh'watun fa-aṣliḥū bayna akhawaykum wa-ittaqū al-laha laʿallakum tur'ḥamūna
